meanings.sent1: She nudged the door open with her elbow.
meanings.sent2: He nudged his friend to get his attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat nudged the ball with its paw, trying to play.
meanings.sent4: The sun nudged its way through the clouds, brightening the sky.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze nudged the leaves, creating a soothing rustling sound.

meanings.sent1: The teacher nudged the student to participate in class discussions.
meanings.sent2: She nudged her sister to apply for the job she wanted.
meanings.sent3: The book nudged readers to explore their creativity.
meanings.sent4: His words nudged her towards pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The supportive comments nudged him to continue his project with enthusiasm.
